name: makeshift gas hood
//: Realistically it would be always on, but there's no way to make it only deplete charges in gas without the use action.
description: A hood with added lenses and filter material sewn between layers of fabric, similar to designs common in WWI.  It is designed to be worn over a helmet.  More breathable than a modern gas mask but not as effective, the only way to change the filter is to take it apart.  It still must be prepared before use.
